headline: 3 Market-Beating Stocks on Our Watchlist
summary: Stocks that outperform the market usually share key traits such as rising sales, expanding margins, and increasing returns on capital. The select few that can do all three for many years are often the ones that make you life-changing money.

headline: Ethisphere Names Lam Research as One of the World's Most Ethical Companies® for Third Consecutive Year
summary: Lam Research Corp. (Nasdaq: LRCX) today announced that it has received the 2025 World's Most Ethical Companies® recognition by Ethisphere, a global leader in defining and advancing the standards of ethical business practices. Lam is the only wafer fabrication equipment provider included on this year's list of honorees.
